subject: Re: The Audiovox booooooooombox
author: tim_woolworth
full_text:
Sounding good so far, Frank.  You are right, the audio quality in these prefabbed boomboxes is superior.

In the AM boost clip I hear:

.03  hultay
.07  find Tim

The rest I believe is radio noise, especially Shanahan at the end.  I am not sure what the first word said in this clip is though, it may be a message of sorts.


In the first FM clip I hear:

.03 alright
.04 Fay
.11 I don't tape record the one (not very clear, but this is what it sounds like to my ears)


In the last FM clip I hear:

.01 Getting called from me -or- Getting call from Dee
.06 Help people
.11 Right this hand (not very clear, but this is what it sounds like to my ears)

Nice work as usual!

Tim


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Just need a switch for the AM antenna amp. FM kinda noisy. "PLL"==phase
> locked loop. This one has a delay when fiorst turned on, or when the band is
> changed, it has to wait for the sweep to bottom out before the sound comes
> on.
> 
> F-S
>
